entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
